content.html: Advanced global cmd trick: to sort the keys inside an array of obj/hash/dict/whatever, you can pass to the global command a pattern range: :g/pattern1/,/pattern2/cmd :g/{/+1,/}/-1 sort The patterns are /{/+1 and /}/-1 (the line after "{" and the line before "}" :h :sort #vim
content.value:
Advanced global cmd trick: to sort the keys inside an array of obj/hash/dict/whatever, you can pass to the global command a pattern range:

:g/pattern1/,/pattern2/cmd

:g/{/+1,/}/-1 sort

The patterns are /{/+1 and /}/-1 (the line after "{" and the line before "}"

:h :sort

#vim
